entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 2 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF FLURRIES IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS AROUND 18
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF SNOW 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 20
